title: bhAgyamE bhAgyam
sahitya:
bhAgyamE bhAgyam bhAnukula tilakA


anupallavi

  pArellAm paDaittup-parindu kAkkum unai bAlakanAi peTra kOshalai shei perum


caraNam    shIraDiyAl naDandu shenru shApam tIrttAi shiTriDai ahalyai shei perum bhAgyam
 shilai vaLaittu sItai karam piDittAi shirappuyar janakan shei perum bhAgyam
 taru Ezhum tuLittAyoru kapi shei bhAgyam arashuDan aruLIndAi arakkan shei bhAgyam
 paraman unaip-piriyAdarugil paNi puriya urugi urugi nAmam parugip-parugi peruvEn
